ModMetaData.name: Verb Expansion Framework
ModMetaData.author: ilikegoodfood
ModMetaData.description:
This Framework implements a number of improvements to the handling of attack verbs in RimWorld. - Animals will now recognize and use ranged attack verbs. - All pawns will recognize and use ranged attack verbs that are provided through apparel, equipment, hediffs and race definitions. - AI will approximate the useful of any ranged verbs they possess, and select the most effective. - A new `switch verb` has been added alongside the equipment gizmo. If a colonist has any ranged verb that is not from their equipment, this gizmo will display it and allow you to choose which ranged verb they will use in combat (colonist must be drafted to change selected verb).
More enhancements to verbs are expected to follow, such as smoke-pop-belts and shield belts for animals and mechanoids, verbs with a cooldown period and much more besides.
This is intended as a re-implementation of the RangedAnimalFramework for 1.0, with new, more powerful features and greater compatibility.
